amount.description: The amount of the top-up in the smallest currency unit, e.g., 100 cents for $1

currency.description: The currency in which the top-up was made, e.g., USD, EUR

description.description: A brief description of the purpose of the top-up

metadata.description: Additional information related to the top-up

status.description: Current status of the top-up, e.g., succeeded, failed

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'top-up'

balance_transaction.description: ID of the balance transaction that describes the impact of this top-up on your account balance

created.description: Timestamp indicating when the top-up was created

updated.description: Timestamp indicating when the top-up was last updated

destination_balance.description: ID of the balance that the top-up is ultimately creating

expected_availability_date.description: Expected date when the funds from the top-up will become available

failure_code.description: Error code describing why the top-up failed if it did

failure_message.description: A message explaining why the top-up failed if it did

livemode.description: Indicates whether the top-up was made in test/live mode

source.description: Details about the payment source used for the top-up

statement_descriptor.description: The statement descriptor displayed on customers' statements for the top-up

transfer_group.description: A unique identifier for the transfer group this top-up is in
